channel.title: Remove CacheDownloader
channel.description: Can someone teach me how to remove the CacheDownloader so that I could put the cache in the same folder as the client? And how to make the client read that the client is in the folder and not in c:/. Thanks.

item.title: Remove CacheDownloader
item.dc:creator: @heatrn11 heatrn11
item.description:
@heatrn11 wrote:

hotrock767:

Can someone teach me how to remove the CacheDownloader so that I could put the cache in the same folder as the client? And how to make the client read that the client is in the folder and not in c:/. Thanks.

removing autocachedownloader.java will not change jack shit, All you have to do is change the signlink.java.

Read full topic
